summary.span: 使用加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 提供的 算法的实现执行非对称加密和解密。

span.span: Performs asymmetric encryption and decryption using the implementation of the algorithm provided by the cryptographic service provider (CSP).

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是的默认实现 。This is the default implementation of . 如果安装了 Microsoft 增强的加密提供程序，则支持从384位到16384位的密钥大小增量为8位。The supports key sizes from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. 如果安装了 Microsoft 基本加密提供程序，则它支持从384位到512位的密钥大小。It supports key sizes from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed. 有效密钥大小取决于 (CSP) 的实例所使用的加密服务提供程序 。Valid key sizes are dependent on the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that is used by the instance. Windows Csp 为之前的 Windows 版本启用了384到16384位的密钥 [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)] ，并为提供了从512到16384的密钥大小 [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)] 。Windows CSPs enable keys sizes of 384 to 16384 bits for Windows versions prior to [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)], and key sizes of 512 to 16384 bits for [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 文档中的 [CryptGenKey](/windows/win32/api/wincrypt/nf-wincrypt-cryptgenkey) 函数。For more information, see [CryptGenKey](/windows/win32/api/wincrypt/nf-wincrypt-cryptgenkey) function in the Windows documentation. ## 与 Microsoft 加密 API 互操作 (CAPI) Interoperation with the Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI) 与非托管 CAPI 中的 RSA 实现不同，类会在 加密后和解密之前反转已加密字节数组的顺序。Unlike the RSA implementation in unmanaged CAPI, the class reverses the order of an encrypted array of bytes after encryption and before decryption. 默认情况下， 无法使用 capi 函数对类加密的数据进行解密 `CryptDecrypt` ，类不能对由 capi 方法加密的数据 `CryptEncrypt` 进行解密 。By default, data encrypted by the class cannot be decrypted by the CAPI `CryptDecrypt` function and data encrypted by the CAPI `CryptEncrypt` method cannot be decrypted by the class. 如果在 Api 之间进行互操作时没有对反向排序进行补偿，则 类将引发 。If you do not compensate for the reverse ordering when interoperating between APIs, the class throws a . 若要与 CAPI 进行互操作，必须手动反转加密字节的顺序，然后再将加密数据与另一个 API 进行互操作。To interoperate with CAPI, you must manually reverse the order of encrypted bytes before the encrypted data interoperates with another API. 通过调用方法，可以轻松地反转托管字节数组的顺序 。You can easily reverse the order of a managed byte array by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 类将一个字符串加密为一个字节数组，然后将这些字节解密回一个字符串。The following code example uses the class to encrypt a string into an array of bytes and then decrypt the bytes back into a string. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例将使用创建的密钥信息导出 到 对象。The following code example exports the key information created using the into an object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用随机的密钥对初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a random key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个 适用于加密会话密钥的密钥对，以便可以安全地存储和与其他用户交换会话密钥。This constructor creates an key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 生成的密钥对应于使用 `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` 非托管 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 中使用的值生成的密钥。The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/专用密钥对。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately. 如果在 需要密钥之前未通过方法加载密钥或任何其他密钥导入方法，则会根据需要创建1024位临时密钥。If no key is loaded via the method, or any other key import method, before a key is needed then a 1024-bit ephemeral key is created on demand. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 类将一个字符串加密为一个字节数组，然后将这些字节解密回一个字符串。The following code example uses the class to encrypt a string into an array of bytes and then decrypt the bytes back into a string. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建或重用使用参数的字段指定的密钥容器 `parameters` 。This constructor creates or reuses a key container specified using the field of the `parameters` parameter. 默认情况下，此构造函数将创建一个 适合于加密会话密钥的密钥对，以便可以安全地存储和与其他用户交换会话密钥。By default, this constructor creates an key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 生成的密钥对应于使用 `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` 非托管 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 中使用的值生成的密钥。The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 可以 通过将 参数的字段设置为值，创建适用于对) 消息或文件进行身份验证 (的密钥对 `parameters` 。You can create a key pair suitable for authenticating (digitally signed) messages or files by setting the field of the `parameters` parameter to the value. 此类型的密钥对应于 `AT_SIGNATURE` CAPI 中使用的值。This type of key corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI. 如果 使用指定的值创建一个对象， 然后 使用指定的值创建另一个对象 ，则如果两个对象指定相同的密钥容器名称，则这两个键都将放置在一个容器中。If you create an object with the value specified and then create another object with the value specified, both keys will be placed in a single container if both objects specify the same key container name. 若要使用类创建与强名称签名兼容的密钥 ，必须创建 密钥对。To create a key that is compatible with strong-name signing using the class, you must create a key pair. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，生成新的密钥，并将其存储在密钥容器中。The following code example creates an object, generates a new key, and stores it in a key container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可检索有关加密密钥对的附加信息。Use the property to retrieve additional information about a cryptographic key pair. 返回的 对象描述密钥是否可导出，并指定密钥容器名称、有关提供程序的信息以及其他信息。The returned object describes whether the key is exportable, and specifies the key container name, information about the provider, and other information. 在生成随机密钥的情况下，在调用使用密钥的方法之前，不会创建密钥容器。In cases where a random key is generated, a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key. 如果尚未创建密钥容器，则属性返回的对象的某些属性将引发。Some properties of the object returned by the property will throw a if a key container has not been created. 若要确保已创建密钥容器，请先调用、、、等方法 ， 然后再调用 属性。To make sure that a key container has been created, call a method such as , , , , and so on, before you call the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to call the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果安装了 Microsoft 增强的加密提供程序，则支持从384位到16384位的密钥大小增量为8位。The supports key sizes from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. 如果安装了 Microsoft 基本加密提供程序，则它支持从384位到512位的密钥大小。It supports key sizes from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed. 有效密钥大小取决于 (CSP) 的实例所使用的加密服务提供程序 。Valid key sizes are dependent on the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that is used by the instance. Windows Csp 为之前的 Windows 版本启用了384到16384位的密钥大小 [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)] ，并为提供了从512到16384的密钥大小 [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)] 。Windows CSPs enable key sizes of 384 to 16384 bits for Windows versions prior to [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)], and key sizes of 512 to 16384 bits for [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 文档中的 [CryptGenKey](/windows/win32/api/wincrypt/nf-wincrypt-cryptgenkey) 函数。For more information, see [CryptGenKey](/windows/win32/api/wincrypt/nf-wincrypt-cryptgenkey) function in the Windows documentation. 类不允许使用属性更改密钥大小 。The class does not allow you to change key sizes using the property. 写入此属性的任何值都将无法更新属性，且不会出错。Any value written to this property will fail to update the property without error. 若要更改密钥大小，请使用构造函数重载之一。To change the key size, use one of the constructor overloads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建使用方法进行验证的数字签名 。This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the method. `halg`参数可以接受 、 或 。The `halg` parameter can accept a , a , or a . 字符串值可以是下列值之一：The string value can be one of the following: - 要使用的哈希算法的对象标识符 (OID) 要使用的哈希算法的友好名称。The object identifier (OID) friendly name of the hash algorithm to use, either a name registered in the crypto config file or one in the Crypto API OID table. - OID 值。The OID value. OID 必须是加密 API 可识别的项。The OID must be one recognized by the Crypto API. 例如，可以使用 SignData (new byte [5]，"1.3.14.3.2.26" ) 或 SignData (new byte [5]，"sha1" ) ，或 SignData (new byte [5]，"SHA1" ) 。For example, you could use SignData(new byte[5], "1.3.14.3.2.26") or SignData(new byte[5], "sha1"), or SignData(new byte[5], "SHA1"). ## Examples 下面的代码示例对数据进行签名和验证。The following code example signs and verifies data. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在计算机的密钥存储而不是用户配置文件存储中保留密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key should be persisted in the computer's key store instead of the user profile store.

value.span: 如果应在计算机密钥存储中保留密钥，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 `true` 等效于将 标志传递给 对象。Setting this property to `true` is equivalent to passing the flag to a object. 属性应用于当前应用程序域中的所有代码，而 对象仅适用于显式引用该对象的类。The property applies to all code in the current application domain, whereas the object applies only to classes that explicitly reference it. 在未加载其用户配置文件的帐户下模拟或运行时，这些设置很有用。These settings are useful when impersonating or running under an account whose user profile is not loaded. 只有在 不带参数初始化的情况中，设置才会影响密钥存储位置。Setting affects the key store location only if is initialized with no parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，并将静态 属性设置为使用计算机密钥存储，而不是用户配置文件密钥存储。The following code example creates an object and sets the static property to use the machine key store instead of the user profile key store. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证 方法生成的数字签名 。This method verifies the digital signature produced by the method. 签名通过使用其签名的公钥获取签名的哈希值，并将该值与提供的数据的哈希值进行比较来进行验证。The signature is verified by obtaining the hash value from the signature using the public key it was signed with, and comparing that value to the hash value of the provided data. `halg`参数可以接受 、 或 。The `halg` parameter can accept a , a , or a . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法来验证签名。The following example shows how to use the method to verify a signature. 此代码示例是为方法提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the method.
